divs: Sighting Details3 bright orange fireballs seen over the Hershey, PA area. Stayed stationary the entire duration and did not lose altitude at any time, as aerial flares would do. Each of the lights would randomly flicker and "turn off" and then "turn back on" in the same position. Lasted about 6 minutes before theyd just seemed to turn off the lights one by one.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Hershey
There were no other sightings in Hershey on or around July 23rd 2013
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
